snippet: David Samson’s role in the aftermath of the bridge scandal and his ties to Gov. Chris Christie, who appointed him, are expected to receive close scrutiny by a new investigative panel.
abstract: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey chief David Samson’s role in aftermath of George Washington Bridge scandal, and his ties to New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, who appointed him, are expected to receive close scrutiny by investigative panel; days of Samson's preference for maintaining low profile are likely over.

byline.original: By RUSS BUETTNER and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

lead_paragraph: David Samson’s role in the aftermath of the bridge scandal and his ties to Gov. Chris Christie, who appointed him, are expected to receive close scrutiny by a new investigative panel.

headline.main: As Inquiry Widens, Port Authority Chief May Lose His Low Profile
headline.print_headline: As Inquiry Widens, Port Authority Chief May Lose His Low Profile

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
